content: The Tiny Piece of Gold is only of an Uncommon rarity, meaning you will likely find a lot of them early on in your through. Be sure to sell them at a vendor or the Shrine store as soon as you can.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Tiny_Piece_of_Gold.md', within the main section titled 'Tiny Piece of Gold'.
The content is as follows:
The Tiny Piece of Gold is only of an Uncommon rarity, meaning you will likely find a lot of them early on in your through. Be sure to sell them at a vendor or the Shrine store as soon as you can.
